website_summaries.verdict: Featuring good construction and sound isolation, this headphone gives you the option of using it wireless or with an included AUX cable.
pros: Constructed from soft synthetic ear cushions and a flexible headband
Comes with an optional AUX cable for wired listening
cons: On the heavy side, and some felt that it made their ears too hot
Reports that the Bluetooth range isn't that great with this option

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Product Leads to Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After less than 1 month of use, the right speaker no longer works. As I usually have a positive experience with Skullcandy products, I would like to consider this item a lemon and not indicative of the company as a whole. But, that does not give me comfort in having a broken piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Terrible,
customer_reviews.text: These expensive headphones stopped working two months after using them. We purchased a protection plan that was a fraud they said it was a manufactures issue. I have requested a full refund from Amazon after a long runaround. Dont purchase them!!
customer_reviews.author: letalove

customer_reviews.title: Dont be fooled by the title/description
customer_reviews.text: First off, dont be fooled by the title and description of "powerful bass" these headphones have zero bass. Infect while listening to music or spunds like you are in a tunnel. Don't waste your money on these. Very disappointed, i remember skullcandy always being bass heavy, hence the purchase. They will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Hoffses

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort, but charge port craps out within a year.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fantastic and in general, I love these headphones. However at just short of a year, they are all but impossible to charge. I plug them in and have to move the charger "plug" into the headphones around until the charge light goes on and then it only lasts 10-20 seconds. It's very frustrating. I do not use them near enough for these to be messing up already. So disappointed. I hope the people I recommended these to aren't going through the same thing. If they aren't, they really are great in every other way. Sucks I won't be able to use mine for much longer. :/
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but 6 months later they died
customer_reviews.text: These worked great while they actually worked. I have had these for 6 months and they sounded great, they worked great (for the most part...I had a few connectivity issues throughout their life, but alas at 6 mos they just died. Not ran out of charge, not had a glitch that could've been worked around.....they straight up DIED they wont charge, turn on... nothing! And now I'm sitting here confused and stuck between the decision to buy another of these same headphones because they were a great value when they worked, or do I buy a more expensive Hugh quality pair and risk the same thing happening at a higher cost. *sigh* decisions, decisions.....smh
customer_reviews.author: Crystal T.

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless headphones but BIG
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good wireless headphones. What I like --- + easy to pair + like that it has voice prompts + when paired with apple I can see the battery level + sound quality on wireless is OK but that's expected since you can't get the quality on wireless vs. wired + on wired the sound quality is much better but not as good as my higher end headphones + pretty comfortable to wear. + can plug in a cable for regular use + pretty durable. I've dropped them a few times and no issues. + wireless range is pretty good what i don't like -- + they are BIG. + wireless sound quality not great.
customer_reviews.author: Hank2000

customer_reviews.title: High pitched beep with high noise warning sucks
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones but if you turn your volume up too loud there built in with a high noise warning with a very high pitched beep! This wouldnt be so bad if it was a lower tone but with the volume already at a high volume it makes the high pitched beep 1000 times worse and really hurts the ears. Aside from that the quality is very good and the noise canceling isnt so bad but sometimes the music sounds a bit dulled. Battery lasts 2-4 days depending on usage. Has a good range and has easy controls on the headset
customer_reviews.author: HelplessLeaf

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. For typical headphone use. But I LIKE EXTREME BASS.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I just purchased these. I thought they were be just as good as my $100 Skullcandy "Crusher Wireless". The bass on those bad boys are insane!! The bass on these Hesh 2 Wireless headphones are premature compared to my "Crusher Wireless". I guess that's why the prices differ. If you don't care too much about bass, then these headphones do the trick. If you want EXTREME bass where you can feel EACH BEAT traveling through you ear buds, these aren't it. I would recommend Crusher Wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: For the price I expeceted more!
customer_reviews.text: Skull Candy has been my go to for headphones. These were really disappointing. They have very thick non flexible cuffs around the ears and it feels weird and uncomfortable on my ears. They are really heavy! I would totally notice these after an hour or so. I do not want headphones that make my neck hurt. The sound is like its being projected through a tin can. Not great! Was really disappointed in this model.
customer_reviews.author: APrat 1

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy... you really can do better! I know you can!
customer_reviews.text: One side is solid and clicks to adjust for head size... the other side slides, no clicking to hold it in place. Also the noise in the headphones like its turning on and off if you pause to do anything else on phone while using headphones. It's almost like ears are plugging and unplugging! Awful. Wanted to heart these cause they look/feel nice... but not the case. They arrived fast, and packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: fizzgig

customer_reviews.title: looks good, has terrific sound and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This Skullcandy Hesh 2 Bluetooth Wireless Over-Ear Headphones are well priced and worth the purchase. They are well designed, looks good, has terrific sound and comfortable to wear. They are easy to set up and quick to charge up. The rechargeable battery provides about 12 - 15 hours of music when it is fully charge. It has Soft synthetic leather ear cushions hence it provide endless comfort for your longest playlists or movie. Finally, it has good sound interface, powerful bass; clear natural vocals and quality sound range.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Luke Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are really THE BEST headphones on the market hands down! Why, you ask? Well they have superior sound quality and noise canceling ability while not costing a fortune. I prefer them to any other headphones I’ve ever had because you can wear them for a long time and not feel like your ears are going to fall off. They fit perfectly over the ear and are easy to use. The Hesh 2 replaced my original Skullcandies after they got lost in the ocean. When someone ran over my Hesh 2s I replaced them with the Hesh 3 but returned to the 2 when I didn’t find them to be as comfortable. You really can’t go wrong with these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brydon

customer_reviews.title: These are good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for going on 4 years. Had to change the cups after a two. got the cups on aliexpress. they still work. still hold a charge. are comfortable for me and my ears are funny. I usually cannot wear on ears for a long time. before these a used to change headphones at least once usually twice a year. I still have the cord and it works fine. and I got this on warehouse deals. Highly recommended especially at a discount. They are not that loud. but they are more than loud enough. I may try to get another pair TBH. although Anker makes what seems to be a good pair also for less.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Satney

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wear these headphones for my daily walks and on the threadmill. The sound is crisp and clear, they cover my entire ear, blue tooth has worked good with my iphone and fire. One concern is the sweat from my ears builds up on the headphone covers, no absorption allowed but easy to wipe dry. You can hear noise around you well enough so your aware of your surroundings when walking or riding your bike. I would purchase these again or an on the ear style to reduce sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Troy N

customer_reviews.title: Because I need to listen to My Favorite Murder at work...
customer_reviews.text: I got these so I can listen to my favorite podcast, My Favorite Murder (what's up fellow Murderinos?!?!), while at work. The connectivity of these things are simple and the sound and comfort is awesome. Battery power also seems to last me way longer than they say these should last! My only gripe is that I bought these right before Black Friday and then come to find out Skullcandy was selling them at 50% off on their website which could have saved me like $40. Either way, glad I got a hold of these. Thanks for reading and remember... stay sexy, don't get MURDERED!! <3
customer_reviews.author: VonDutchRudder

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through several set of headphones in the past, but by far these are the best ones I have ever owned. In my personal opinion, these are much, MUCH better than the Beats I once owned (and sold off to buy these). Though Skullcandy is not the first brand most audiophiles flock to, I am quite happy to say these headphones gracefully cover the full spectrum of sound. As far as wearing them, I wear glasses and have had no problem wearing these headphones all day while wearing my glasses. From their design, I see that Skullcandy had comfort as one of their number one things to offer with these headphones. You will not be disappointed! Thank you, Skullcandy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denisse C.

customer_reviews.title: My last pair of Hesh 2 headphones lasted 5 years
customer_reviews.text: I went with the version of these I knew. They were durable, sound quality very good, noise cancel so so, great for calls, gaming, whatever. I ABUSED them, threw them around... no breaks, they don’t fold for storage (that’s a god thing!) tough tough tough. Affordable for high output performance. I have no reason to believe these will not last as well as my first pair. I have not heard such good reviews for Hesh 3. I would hope they bring these back and call them Hesh Classic or something... because these are really GOOD for under 50 bucks!!!
customer_reviews.author: DogTrainer365

customer_reviews.title: My son received these for Christmas and loved them so much that when they were stolen 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: My son received these for Christmas and loved them so much that when they were stolen 5 months later, he wanted the exact same ones. The bluetooth is easy to connect and makes listening a breeze. He uses them to block out sound when he's studying too. Great buy (twice).
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Not for people who wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but I had to return them. I wear glasses, and these headphones put so much pressure on my head/glasses that I couldn't bear to wear them for longer than 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Decent but a Few Deal Breakers
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sounded pretty decent and easily paired with my iPhone. A few things I don't like about these headphones: 1) Cups are kind of small and just barely fit over my ears -- and I don't have big ears! 2) There is absolutely no cushioning on the headband so the hard plastic band sits against the top of my head and soon begins to hurt. 3) The blue power button flashes off and on while listening to music. It's especially annoying while listening in a dark environment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth useless..
customer_reviews.text: The sound of the Hesh 2 earphones isn't bad. In my opinion the headphones have a little too much bass on the bottom end. My issue with the Hesh 2 earphones is the fact that the wireless capabilities are useless if you get too far away from the sound source. In my case, moving fifteen to twenty feet or so from the sound source causes that Bluetooth chattering. I can't even turn my head away from the sound source without invoking the annoying chatter (choppy, signal interruption) sound. I was so disgusted with the poor Bluetooth range, it prompted this review.
customer_reviews.author: SOLDIEROFYHVH

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair. We like them.
customer_reviews.text: This is our third pair, one for me, one for the wife (hesh 3), and we bought this one for her dad. Use these for mowing grass and while on airplane. Never had any other more expensive brands but we are very happy with these and cant imagine a $300 pair being that much better. I have had my pair for about 5 years and they still work great. The wife has the Hesh 3 which are lighter and more compact but I think the Hesh 2 has a little more volume and are built more sturdy. Buy these if you are not a brand snob.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality, comfortable, and they look nice!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for about 45 minutes and I am very pleased with the sound quality and comfort! I just picked these up yesterday on a Deal of the Day for $41.99 and they are worth every penny! The quality isn't top notch but that was expected on head phones that usually retail at around $70. This wasn't enough for me to take a way 1 star! I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Function over form
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great if you are on a budget and looking for over-ear Bluetooth headphones. They are the first pair that I have owned. If you are a fashionista, do not buy. These headphones appear extremely goofy because they stick out so far from the side of your head, so much so that I have whacked them on doorways numerous times while walking. Maybe they would not look as goofy if you have big hair (mine is short). Sound quality seems pretty good for the price. While making phone calls, the microphone has worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: obiwan kenobi

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for wireless BT headphones.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great, exactly what I was looking for. They sound great when connected to Bluetooth. They sound even better when connected to the Mic 1 cable that it comes with. Unfortunately my Mic 1 cable messed up on the first day! The button that's on the other side of the mic. All the operations don't work anymore ( play/pause , next track/previous track, voice command, take/make calls.) Pretty disappointed on that, I would give the rating 3 stars but I'm not because the BT and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Owl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The right side has NO SOUND after 6 months. It's my second pair of broken Skullcandy headphones. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good, headband is not cushioned and hurts.
customer_reviews.text: Pros:the The sound is pretty good. It does not compare to the Boss headphones we have, in my opinion. The built in Mic works well. I didn't hear any complaints when using these for calls. The range seemed to be really good. I could walk all around the house without moving my phone. Cons: The big negative and the reason that I am returning this item is that the headband is not padded/cushioned at all. My head hurt after a few minutes of wear. I tried them on separate occasions (different days) and it was the same result: very quick headache.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: High quality & the most durable headphones I have found.
customer_reviews.text: This was the second set of these headphones I have purchased. The first set is still fully functional three years later. I wanted a set i could leave at work and one for traveling & at home. They have good sound and the soft over ear pads help mimimize exterior sound (not technically sound cancelling nor advertised as such.) The mic has excelent pick up and the sound quality is great. They connect and work well with computers, wierless devices and even my Xbox One (using the provided cord) For those of you like my self who have a tendancy to see the headbands on their headphones snap; these will not have that problem. Would recomend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Calamari

customer_reviews.title: Not for running
customer_reviews.text: They sound nice. Noise cancelling is pretty good. They are NOT for running though. -They are very large. I like to go without music for the first few miles and I can't wear these above my ears or down around my neck - they're just too big! -If you run on the road it's difficult to hear cars. If you're just walking or sitting around, these would probably be fantastic. They might even be good for weightlifting. But they are not the running headphones for me :(
customer_reviews.author: scharfty

customer_reviews.title: So Convenient to Use at Work
customer_reviews.text: Before I had this headset, I was using a corded headphone and it was a royal pain. I work in a lab and I'm constantly sitting and standing and walking around. I was always tethered to an outlet and would forget to detach it when I had to get up to go do something. Now I don't even have to think about it. I just get up and go. My only wish is that the noise cancelling was better because I work in a noisy lab. But other than that, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fairly nice noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They're not as expensive as most but have a better quality. Only issues is it's not very sleek, they kind of stick far off of your ears and they tend to have some sort of background noise when music is paused. Other than that they are great. They cancel noise fairly well for the price and the sound quality is awesome. I use them for gaming, listening to music and watching videos. Would definately get them again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D'Annunzio

customer_reviews.title: A decent buy, but not for load music listeners.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and the price, but the songs are low and the bass is not very heavy unless you can alter the song before you download it. Does cancel out sound. I can’t hear anyone unless my songs are downloaded low.. You can’t skip through track from the headphone. Durable and secure on my head in the sweaty moments of running, lifting or performing random CrossFit exercises.. callers can’t hear you well either. There’s some sort of delay between my iPhone 11 Pro Max and this headset. They hear me, but not well and it’s always delayed.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Navarez

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my son's birthday. He loves them! He uses them both wirelessly and wired (when needed). It doesn't really say in the description whether it is on-ear or over-the-ear but it comfortably fits over-the-ear for both my son and me. The sound is very pleasing and not overly bass-heavy. The headphones do stick out quite a bit from your head and according to my son, they are not very comfortable to wear around your neck when they're not in use (because of the size and the fact that they do not twist or fold). That would be my only complaint about them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first two weeks. Now, constant stuttering and choppiness over bluetooth, regardless of how bluetooth and wireless channels are configured. I use two other sets of wireless headphones with multiple devices (phone, laptops, tablets) and they exhibit no problems at all. Thanks for cutting whatever corners it is you decided to cut and wasting my hard earned money. Last time I buy Skull Candy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fields

customer_reviews.title: it certainly sounds very good; for both music and calls [both when using ...
customer_reviews.text: For my untrained ears, it certainly sounds very good; for both music and calls [both when using bluetooth and the 3.5 jack]. I've used them on the commute to/from work, as well as 13 hour flights to Asia. The headphones itself is a little bit small though, so my ears sort of ends up hurting after using a while. Other than that, it's also surprisingly very durable as well. My 8 years old son has been using it whenever I'm not, and he tends to be rough with it. So all in all, I'd say it's a pretty good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: xhunt

customer_reviews.title: Okay with a bright ass light
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is fine for the price. I am a radio DJ so I am used to pairs that cost $1000 and upwards. These are fine for audio books. By some dumb design the light on one side flashes blue so unless you want to keep everyone in bed with you awake also, you have to put a piece of tape over that dumb thing. The battery lasts well. I have gone a whole week without changing and they have never died. Pretty good for something made in China no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Cannot handle multiple bluetooth connections
customer_reviews.text: Ok but cannot handle multiple bluetooth connections. If I pair it with device A, then device B, device A can no longer connect to the headphones. I have to totally remove the pairing and perform the pairing again. As someone who wants to use one set of headphones for phone calls, computer, and console gaming, this is unacceptable. Otherwise the sound quality is fine.
customer_reviews.author: John Wesley Watson

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions.
customer_reviews.text: The matte black on the cans are a great look, and the headphones themselves are comfortable enough. The sound quality is a bit tame for my taste, but I've only had it for about an hour and a half so maybe it'll grow on me. Don't get me wrong the sound is crystal clear, and I consider myself a budget audiophile (HD 518), but the sound is a bit on the tame side. The bass this there, but not crazy. I'll give a more direct review in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahima

customer_reviews.title: In a picnch if you have small ears.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as I was waiting for a long flight... Not the most comfortable, a bit tight and the cups barely cover my ears mostly. After a few hours, I need a break. Got some fancy dandy overpriced headset from a client so I'll probably give these away to some kid. Sonically, they don't suck, not too hype like Beats and not to smooth like others.
customer_reviews.author: R. Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent, very soft comfortable padded leather earphone covers
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple of months before I actually tried the Skullcandy Hesh 2 Bluetooth Wireless Headphones. I am new to doing all of this new technology, guessing, buying, returning due to my techy guru is gone. But I finally took a chance, and voila I managed all by myself. The quality is excellent, very soft comfortable padded leather earphone covers. I even fell asleep with them on with no problem :) Oh and by the way, they connected to my Sandisk mp3 device, splendidly, how hard was that ? :) So happy, keeper for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones to connect to bluetooth devices and cancel out the noise around me. So far they have worked great and definitely lived up to the Skullcandy name. The bluetooth is strong and definitely goes a fair amount of range before you start losing signal. The microphone built in is also nice and people have said they can hear me clearly. The sound quality is great no matter what type of music you are listening to and they definitely help cut out the ambient noise in the environment. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good set of bluetooth headphones for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great cans, my son is happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cans for my son in December 2018. After 2 months of use, I am writing this review. Usage is occasional and limited to Music and TV. These are very big and heavy. Build is solid and heavy too. Pairing is very fast. I have paired with Amazon echo dot, Fire TV, mobile phones and does not find much trouble. Sound is good and Bass is not that less as mentioned in many reviews. I heard "god is a woman", "Hotline Bling" and felt great. Earpads are comfortable and sometimes I feel the heat after use of 1 hour or so Overall good can for $55. Nothing much to complain.
customer_reviews.author: ProdLover2020

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I have a phone that doesn't use a traditional headphone jack. I charge these the night before I need to use them, and the charge lasts for a long while - I didn't need to charge them after 8 hours of travel, and they had enough while I went around town for ~4 hours the next day. I don't even think they ran out; I just like to keep things charged to be safe. I will say that these are comfortable, but if you have a variety of ear piercings (especially tragus piercings and/or stretched lobes), these might rest a little uncomfortably on them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is 'on-the-fence' with this headset, don't be. It's amazing, great build quality and great sound quality. If I were to complain about something (and this is the reason for the -1 star review) is that while it's comfortable to wear, the earpieces don't rotate at all so if you need to adjust them a bit for your comfort, it wont budge. Also, to this point, the headset squeezes a tiny bit but not enough to really make it a problem. Bottom line, this is a great product and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Not awful....but not great
customer_reviews.text: I'm no snob, but these are not nearly as good as their earbuds. A bit muffled, and the bass is nearly non-existent. I was hoping what with them being all burly and not exactly cheap that they would be great. They're mediocre. I do feel they are overpriced. I only kept them because they're good enough. And they're blue. But they hold a charge for a goodly around of time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the price. Great sound, comfortable, wireless. Lots of positives. There are a few minor things that bother me, but I wouldn't say they're deal breakers. The lack of these things makes sense for this price point. One thing is they don't fold down at all. Like I said, just cuz it doesn't do that, isn't the end of the world. I just travel with these a lot and as a result they take up more room than they need to. The other issue is that they are quite wide. They seem wider than any other headphone I've had. Now obviously this doesn't effect quality, but does look a little weird.
customer_reviews.author: PeteM83

customer_reviews.title: They hold up good. (Right side speaker stopped working after a year and a half)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work (carpenter), they're pretty durable I dropped them quite a few times already. Battery life is great, lasts about 3 days without charging. However the right side ear is starting to crackle 8 months after the purchase. That's probably due to the fact that I listen to music full blast everyday for 8-10 hours. Over all would recommend to anyone! (UPDATE) A year and a half later the right side speaker completely stopped working. Unfortunate but it is the reality of it. They we're great while they lasted...
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is more than good for the casual listener. Not extremely loud, but very clear and plenty of bass. They paired up right away. The only semi-negative comment I would make is that the ear cups are a little small, so it takes a little bit of jiggling to get my ears inside the cups, and I have fairly small ears. Once you get that figured out, they're very comfortable. The only reason I didn't give them a 5/5 is the fact that I know that these aren't top-of-the-line. But honestly, for casual listening, they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Israel C.

customer_reviews.title: great value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Skullcandy is always a great value for the $. I have the corded Hesh and enjoy them. I travel a lot and the cords get in the way. I like these, they don't fit too tight and they don't make my glasses crooked like some others (or maybe I have crooked ears). I do find they get a little uncomfortable after prolonged wear (more than 3 hours), but that would happen with any cans (with me anyway). Great noise reduction and sound quality. I will add a caveat that I mainly use them for movies and podcasts/audiobooks. I do listen to music, but not as much as the other. They are great for what I need them to do.
customer_reviews.author: B. Steffey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: The material is better than other headphones I've bought from Skullcandy. However, there is a loose bit in my right headphone that I can hear move when I tilt my head back and forth. The sound is GREAT until I don't have anything playing and then I can literally hear it "click off". I get a little annoyed that the battery doesn't last as long, but overall they're good headphones. I'm just nit picking about stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Evans

customer_reviews.title: Super rad headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Super rad headphones for the price! Just used these on a 16 hour flight and mainly bought them because I didn't want to bring the little iPhone 7 plus headphone pigtail. I used them mixed wired and bluetooth during the flight and they held up fantastic! I'm no audiophile so I can't bore you with "depth of bass wasn't comprable to XYZ" or the "mids sound tinny" but to connect to your iPhone or iPad to watch movies on a flight, I'm super pleased. If I had one gripe, it's that they don't fold but that's not a biggie. Just make room for them in your bag!
customer_reviews.author: gnarlyharley

customer_reviews.title: Ever eat discounted Sushi from a gas station?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the headphones based on skull candy and the 4.6 rating. Now I know what those $5 rebate ratings cards do. They are bland, they sound like retro 1970s school Headphones. Bass, even with loudness settings on high fails. Great headphones for listening to audible maybe some war and peace and even then volume will be maxed out. And yes if I sound bitter it’s because I sent 3 to friends as presents and one for myself. I’ll keep using my skull candy earbuds and the nice cloth bag that came with the hesh headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great - use daily for 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headset for about 1.5 years now. I use them daily - mostly to watch TV and to listen to music via bluetooth. The sound is great, the battery lasts a really long time and they are comfortable. I can walk all over the house and still get reception and my TV is in the bedroom. My college age granddaughter recommend I get them as she has a set and also uses them every day and loves hers too. I highly recommend these. I plan to buy another pair as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend but if you need silence this won’t be for you
customer_reviews.text: These don’t function as noise cancellation but are definite noise dampeners. We got them so my husband could game while the baby was sleeping in the bedroom or if she was crying and he need to do work. This product works well for both. You can hear background noise but it’s not distracting. Sound quality is comparable to air pods but more surround style like turtle beach headphones
customer_reviews.author: Christyn B.

customer_reviews.title: "Over the ear" - not really.
customer_reviews.text: Looking for "over the ear" headphones, I wanted headphones that actually went over the hear, and these don't. Unless you have tiny ears, you'll find that you can technically get these over your ear, but they're actually tightly wrapping them, causing pain after about an hour or so. I'm returning these. I picked up a pair of Skullcandy's Hesh 3 that are actually a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good in house
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get very loud in Bluetooth setting. I purchased for mowing lawn but it wasn't loud enough. Sounds good in house.
customer_reviews.author: rwiens74

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to receive these in perfection condition
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive these in perfection condition! They were already charged up and ready to go out-of-the-box! In fact 4th day in, I am still listening to them and haven't had to charge yet. They are super comfortable on your ears. My only compliant so far is that I can't seem to pair them with my Dell Windows 10 laptop which has blue tooth. I just got this laptop last month so its still relatively new. I tried to see if it would connect and followed the instructions but it wouldn't. Nonetheless, I have them connected to my Iphone 8 and have been using them that way! Skull Candy headphones rock!
customer_reviews.author: Darice Dronzek

customer_reviews.title: Decent gym headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for the gym. The wires of my old earbuds are all frayed and taped up. I wanted to get a pair of headphones that were wireless. I have had experience with Skullcandy in the past and they're pretty decent quality for the price. The audio is nothing to be praised, but they sound nice. The sound isn't very bassy and sticks true to what other people say, it's a very well balanced sound. My only complaint is that they fit very loose on my small head, whenever I lay down on the bench press they like to slide back off my head. But they excel in what I wanted them for, good wireless gym headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Witkowski

customer_reviews.title: recommend these bluetooth wireless over the ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Highly Highly, HIGHLY, recommend these bluetooth wireless over the ear headphones. The sound quality is really good, and it is made of good quality materials. Super duper comfortable. I always go to Best Buy to try out products before I buy, and most of the time Amazon has got them for cheaper. At the time of purchase (7/11/17) I got these (black, the camo and silver ones are more expensive) for $72.00, while at Best Buy and other retail stores it's $99.99 + tax. Easily worth the wait to save $28.
customer_reviews.author: MacDaddy_Pro

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sound, but closer to "on-ear" than "over-ear"
customer_reviews.text: After receiving these the first thing that I noticed was that they fit me like "on-ear" phones, not over-ear. Because of this the sound isolation was poor -- someone sitting several feet from me could clearly hear music vocals even at middling volumes. With that said the sound on these is actually pretty good, but as my main use is in an office environment they're not the right headphones for me.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.H.

customer_reviews.title: I love that. I have these synced with my iphone ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and this headset makes my head looks and feel small. I love that. I have these synced with my iphone 6s+...the sound is very well balanced...the highs sound good and the bass is very well balanced. Skullcandy never dissapoints me. The headsets came with a bag and a charging cord and a headphone plug in case if you don't have your headset charged. i Use this headset on bluetooth setting for when i am driving to work and driving home. For lunch also use it to watch netflix bluetooth as well. I would say that these headsets, the outside noise is very light
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to play fornite on his ipad, i was trying get him a good noise cancellation headphones, seems this ones do the work and not cost more than a 100 for a gaming head set, i only paid 55 for this one and i'm pretty impress on the noise cancellation they have. We went for vacation to Spain and the last more than the whole flights 8 hours and more. Very good desing.
customer_reviews.author: Davie Siu

customer_reviews.title: mic doesn't work with speakers simultaneously
customer_reviews.text: pro - Sound quality is decent cons - The speakers do not work while the mic is active. you can't hear anything if talking though mic. the only way around it is to disable the mic. You can't do team chat in-game. The mic get automatically disable when you connect the included wire - Battery last only 2-3 hours (not 15 hrs as advertised). I have to use it plugged in most of the time
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are under $100 but they are the quality of $300 headphones! I own 2 pairs of them, they are comfortable, noise canceling, easy to connect, you can still take a phone call with them. I have not used them at the gym because i don't want to sweat on them but I've used them every where else, I use them all the time and charge them maybe once every couple weeks, these are the best headphones for an incredible price!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, they sound great and given that I can't hear the differences many people complain about, I'm happy with the sound quality. However, would it kill them to put a small piece of foam on the underside of the head piece? They fit me very well, except that since they rest on the top of my head, the metal puts pressure onto my head. I'm searching my house for one of those foam stickers you use for fitting bike helmets!
customer_reviews.author: hibernating raptor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have used Beats over ear headphones for years and was looking for a wireless version that did not cost a fortune. I took a chance with these and was very surprised. The fit just like beats and the sound quality is awesome. Since I use them for distance running they are perfect they stay in place so I am not having to adjust them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Great Reception, Good Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with these. I'm not an audiophile, but they sound great to me. Plenty of base, treble, etc but not out of balance or anything. They seem to be durable, and stand up to gym use and sweat. The only complaint I have about them is that the ear pads are too small and my ears hurt from the pressure after a while. I got some good Zolo Liberty Plus ear-buds, and I use those a lot more than over-the-ear headphones now.
customer_reviews.author: Huzbum

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they were going to be over the ear headphones, but the can barely be considered that. The earmuffs are circular and small, no human ear is shaped this way. So they still rest on my ear which I really don't like. They sound good but nowhere near as loud as I expecting, max volume is maybe pushing on the "loud" spectrum. The box also came hot glued closed clearly showing that these were opened before which I really don't like either. All in all for $60 I guess it's not horrible, but I'm not happy with it either.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Quilty

customer_reviews.title: No volume control when using aux cable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of headphones that I could have the option of plugging in and not running bluetooth and powering up all the time. These have an aux cable that when plugged in the only way to control volume is through the actual device you're listening through. Headphone controls don't work nor the mic/control button; it is for stop and play only. For the price I'm debating if this is a deal breaker or not.
customer_reviews.author: v forteza

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent headphones. I bought a couple of these for my kids, but after seeing how nice they are I got a pair for myself. I use them for watching TV sometimes late at night, using the Bluetooth function. Having the cable to plug in to other devices makes these really versatile. My daughter uses these for Skype, and conference calls. The built in mic works well. The sounds quality is great, just what you'd expect from Skullcandy.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Grodsky

customer_reviews.title: Wanted larger cups to fit over ears, otherwise these are decent for the range
customer_reviews.text: Don’t fit over the ear since the cups are pretty small for an adult head so they mash the edges of the ear into the head, so obvious not the style for me. Exchanged for a more oval shape pair of cans that were way more comfortable and were a true over ear style. Otherwise these are a good value for the sound and features if the fit is right for you, or you’re slightly smaller but I’d almost consider it a youth size for the cups if you want them to completely surround the ear like I was shopping for. Everyone is different so it’s a matter of preference!
customer_reviews.author: KDE

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Skullcandy fan for years now. I purchased these as a gift for my college kid. The fit is fantastic and extremely comfortable for him. He likes them so much, he wanted me to try them out for myself. After carefully considering how I was going to never give them back 🤔, I must say the noise cancellation is really nice, and the sound is pretty awesome. I think I'll have to buy again since he's not planning on sharing. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiney

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the headphones for a couple of reasons. First, I wanted to use them while mowing the lawn. I've purchased a couple of sets of blue tooth headphones (earbuds) on here and when on the Zero Turn mower they would break up, and the music stream was not constant. With these headphones, I did not have that problem, the connection was solid. My issue with these headphones is that they are comfortable for a little while, perhaps 45 minutes to an hour, but not for extended lengths of time. Using them on a 4 hour plane trip left me with a headache from wearing them. Also, the noise cancellation is average, but not particularly good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Skullcandy delivers on its promises yet again. Crisp clean audio. But if your looking for head rattling bass these aren't for you. Unless you have an extra 300 bucks laying around I highly suggest these headphones they're dope af. Extremely comfortable and hug your head well. Easily connected to my laptop and galaxy s7. I wore them for 6 hours straight when they came in. One of the best purchases I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Treadwell

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on these phones based on reviews. I must say I am completely satisfied. One of my concerns was base. What I have found is that the base is clear, balanced and distortion free. I listen to mostly classic rock, which is not great source material, and I have not been disappointed with the sound quality at all. The Bluetooth has worked flawlessly and the headphones block out outside noise well. I work 9 hour days and have not have to stop listening to recharge. On phone calls my friends have said they can hear me clearly. They are reasonably comfortable but I do have to adjust them on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones. Use them all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the loud co-workers out. The padding on the headphones is great and works well for all day wear. Not sure if I have small ears or not but my ears fit inside the padding. Turned off they provide quite a bit of noise cancelling but once the music is turned on it drowns out most noise. This is not an active noise cancellation but for the price these can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Thirty 45

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and reliability
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to sleep in as my Skullcandy Hesh wired headphones finally bit the dust. They have good sound quality, great battery life, and they have never come unpaired after over a month of owning. The only complaint I have is the bright blue LED on the power button blinks every 5 seconds are so while they are on lighting up half my room while my wife and I are trying to sleep. I reconciled this by laying on that ear cup and burying it in my pillow to begin with, may try electrical tape or a paint pen next to try and mask the LED.
customer_reviews.author: matthew crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, low cost
customer_reviews.text: I'm no audiophile but they sound great to me (as mentioned the bass is not pronounced but still good). Connects easily to my phone with bluetooth with good range, I can easily walk around my apartment and it doesn't break up through walls. The only thing that bothers me sometimes is that they are big! Bought online so wasn't sure of the size but it might not be good for some. Not too heavy though, great to wear around the house. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones 🎧
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchased so many headphones but these are one of my most fav. Battery life is amazing. Nice sound, volume, bass.. over the head headphone helps in walking or workout. Nothing else stays in the ears and that's very annoying. So I passed on Dr. Dre beats, Sony, etc.... these r my number one fav. Skullcandy did a great job. And great price on Amazon. Thank u.
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: Over-Ear Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Pros: *Good range *Very long battery life (last full day) *I like big "+" and "-" buttons. You don't need to guess which button you are holding with your finger - you'll fill it right away. Cons: *Those headphones are NOT "Over-Ear" design as title claims but "On-Ear" . *They are relatively tight. Felt really uncomfortable after couple hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: MeMeMe

customer_reviews.title: Headphones/Headset working perfectly
customer_reviews.text: So far (just got these today)- they charged quickly, no problems pairing with my laptop, superb sound, incredible bass levels, microphone and earphones work great in Zoom app for my tai chi classes, very comfortable to wear long term. Haven't tried pairing with my phone or TV yet, but looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: BLUETOOTH LIGHT CONSTANTLY FLASHES ON THE SIDE OF THE HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are cheap so yea they are made cheap and if you ever shopped at a 5 below store these are the same quality except they are made with skull candy labels. Qjen you pair up the bluetooth there is a constant flashing light on the side of the headphones that looks ridiculous and of course you can not turn it off. The flashing is a bit annoying because everyone in the gym is looking at you. I know $60 is not alot of koney but I wish i would of saved more money and got the Beats instead. I am going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heckuva Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm not comparing against anything other than the earbuds I had prior (which I loved and performed well). Cutting the wire with these was a great decision. I'd listened to Bluetooth headphones before and didn't like that I couldn't crank the volume, no problem with these. I'm not sure of specifics, but the frequency response is great, nice full very low bass and I can hear the high-hat and ride cymbal on the drums w/ clarity. Build quality is solid, comfort is high, they look cool and Bluetooth pairing was as simpler than I could've hoped for: no pairing codes required and there's a 'voice' that tells when you're paired. This purchase was a home run for me.
customer_reviews.author: Casey M. Wise

customer_reviews.title: these headphones are great. After my beats by Dre crapped out after ...
customer_reviews.text: Gosh, these headphones are great. After my beats by Dre crapped out after a year to the date, these headphones have been nothing but wonderful.. I wear them to the gym and they stay on through vigurious HIIT workouts and cardio. Plus, they don't absorb my sweat like the beats by Dre did, so they don't stink.
customer_reviews.author: tori brown

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: First, the sound is absolutely amazing! I just love these. I wear them every single day. Also, the noise cancelling really works. I was heartbroken when I had trouble with one side, but Skullcandy is taking care of it. I should have my headphones in two days. I have other headphones, but nothing compares to the sound I get from these and the way I can just tune out all other noise. Really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a great set of wireless headphones then look no further
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great set of wireless headphones then look no further. Skullcandy has out done themselves with this set. Exactly as advertised and mic in the headphones works great when connecting to your phone no background noise and music sounds great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic you need them in your life.
customer_reviews.text: These cancel noise out as well as sound great. I had forgotten what music sounds like when its not coming out of a small ear bud. And they are pretty comfortable, again so much better than ear buds. And people can now tell when I am listening to something and they don't just start talking at me at work. The battery seems to last awhile too. The microphone works well for phone call as well. All around great purchase for the price. Trying to see if I can hook them up wirelessly to the tv now...
customer_reviews.author: Abogert

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth having...better alternative to beats in cost and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These over the ear headphones are phenemenal in sound quality and longevity. They are pretty comfortable as well. The included and optional cord allows their use even when the battery is dead. Phone calls are clear either with the cord or without. I have already recommened these headphones to everyone I know. Ambient noise is reduced quite a bit so you hear almost nothing but whatever you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Bryguy

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality - Failed and replaced with Manufacturer Warranty..
customer_reviews.text: Got this early Jan 2018, worked great for 6 months, then audio was lost in the right side of the headphone. both wireless and wired did not work. Passed Amazon's return period, filed a claim with manufacturer - process was clean and easy - had to pay one way shipping. Got a replacement product in 3 business days, but it was not the bluetooth enabled model, its okay for getting a replacement product which works .. So far so good..
customer_reviews.author: M. Subramanian

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones on a budget!!
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless headphones. I purchased these after my over-ear Beats took a dive. I was not about to drop another $300 on headphones, and I have owned Skullcandy in the past. To be honest, These put out decent audio, fair mids and lows, they are comfortable, and they link via bluetooth like a breeze. They also feel of good quality, you get what you pay for, definitely. Skullcandy does it again!! If you want a good pair of headphones, look no further. Do it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jace Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, Great battery life. Overall great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great.. I use them for skateboarding and mowing the lawn and playing computer games. My Sons love listening to music on them as well. I would recommend these for anyone looking for BEATS style headphones without the huge price tag. I could literally get 4 pairs of these for 1 of beats.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of Skullcandy but not of these headphones. At full volume, I could hear nearby conversations more clearly than my own music. There isn’t no bass to speak of. In fact, the low and high tones are barely evident. Mid range is fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Shell

customer_reviews.title: Very decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Are these perfect? Absolutely not. They start to really hurt my ears after a few hours of use (and I have normal sized ears). But for this price, I am really quite impressed with both the material quality of the headphones as well as the sound. And I am very picky about sound. I just wish they made them a bit more comfortable for extended use.
customer_reviews.author: sdesign9

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Good for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Good quality and long lasting. Sound isn’t great, but good enough, and for a working out these fit the bill. I’m not dropping $300 on a set of BEATS soooooo...these are solid and don’t fall apart after 2-3 months like all the generic sets. Oh indeed they’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think they’re going to last very long
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had them for 2 months and they are starting to go bad. The speakers crackle and one side is now much louder than the other. Also the Bluetooth range is maybe 10 feet. I can barely cross to the other side of the kitchen without out them cutting out. My Sony pair have lasted over 2 years and I would still be using them if the band didn’t crack.
customer_reviews.author: momof7

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and the sound is great. Also very comfortable. Much more comfortable than previous models and they noise cancellation seems to be pretty good especially for the price point. These are Bose but Skullcandy still delivers a great product. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Majin Buu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphone. They are extremely comfortable and really have a great sound quality. I am not going to pay the "Beats" price for a set of headphones. These have great noise cancelling and work great even if you are away from your phone for some distance.
customer_reviews.author: April HayesTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable, bendable. My teen son is very rough with it and I'm surprised it has not broke. He loves the sound and the bells and whistles that come with it. Looks great, very cool. Would be nice if battery lasted a little longer, but for the price (I got on sale) it was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Maynes

customer_reviews.title: Head phones has performed as described after seven months.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones has performed as described after 7 months. I got stopped by a NYS trooper and issued a warning. Apparently it's illegal to have both ears occupied while driving. Can deaf persons drive in NY? Shouldn't posit that it was a driving-while-black thing since the officer and driver was of similar ethnicities. Can't blame the headset for attracting harassment? These phones are not a statement that I want to make to TLC customers or police but they are fine for running, walking and almost any other common use except driving or cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Be Nice

customer_reviews.title: Jam on
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these headphones so I could listen to music while I'm mowing the lawn. They are great and easy to use. Pair up easily with my phone and the sound quality is clear. I have no complaints, easy to use, fit well and are comfortable over my ears. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BA

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Hesh 2 Wireless Over-Ear Headphone - Silver/Black
product_meta.description: Color:SilverHesh 2 Wireless is the Bluetooth version of our iconic headphone with a new sleek profile and plush, synthetic leather ear pads. With on-board controls and a rechargeable battery, Hesh 2 Wireless lets you move freely with your playlist. Sound Pressure Level: 105dB. Frequency Response: 20Hz - 20KHz. Impedence: 33ohms.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,454 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
